txt.en: 'We can only rely on the rest of the Eastemnet to supply us with arms and armour for so long. If we are to survive and defend ourselves against an assault, we must be able to build our own weapons. A building in the north of town will make a good smithy if we can get it rebuilt and upgraded.'
'Hytbold is one step closer to being rebuilt and restored.'
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
Bring the Tokens of Hytbold to Edgal
